page.title: Structure Properties Pane
page.introduction: The structure properties pane allows editing of the structure name and free text annotations. It is also shows size variable name and voltge variable name (for membranes).

appearance.para: Text fields display Structure Name, Size Variable Name [units in bracket]}, Voltage Variable Name [units in bracket]when a membrane structure is selected, and a free text field to add or edit annotation.

operations.para: Edit the structure name by editing the appropriate text field. A structure name will be rejected if already in use by another structure.
Add or Edit a free text annotation for the structure
